name: Machine'O'War
description:
This game was inspired by the art piece "News" by Jan Senbergs.

Artist Statement:
The art piece represents the scale of human war, along with the media recording it.  I wanted to try and capture this by creating a giant machine that keeps whirring and slamming, seemingly not making any progress what so ever.  You play as the camera, using yourself and a drone to record the machine and it's workers. 

Post Mortem:
http://www.victorweidar.com/2017/10/08/machineowar-post-mortem/
